definition.en:
Whether or not we wait transcoding before publish the video.
ver [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1)
definition.de:
Ob wir mit der Transkodierung warten, bevor wir das Video veröffentlichen.
ver [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1)
definition.fr:
Si nous attendons ou non le transcodage avant de publier la vidéo.
voir [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1)
definition.es:
Esperar o no la transcodificación antes de publicar el vídeo.
ver [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1)

example.en:
```json 
{
  "type": "Video",
  "views": 35,
  "support": "Pay me a coffee when you see me",
  "waitTranscoding": true
}```
example.de:
```json 
{
  "type": "Video",
  "views": 35,
  "support": "Pay me a coffee when you see me",
  "waitTranscoding": true
}```
example.fr:
```json 
{
  "type": "Video",
  "views": 35,
  "support": "Pay me a coffee when you see me",
  "waitTranscoding": true
}```
example.es:
```json 
{
  "type": "Video",
  "views": 35,
  "support": "Pay me a coffee when you see me",
  "waitTranscoding": true
}```

title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
title.de: ActivityPub und Freunde - Eine Ontolgie des Fediverse
title.fr: ActivityPub et ses amis - Une ontologie du fediverse
title.es: ActivityPub y sus amigos - Una ontología del fediverso
